sentences.sContent: He wanted his sons to become strong, virile, and athletic like himself.
sentences.sCn: 他希望他的儿子们变得像他一样身强力壮、充满阳刚之气，并擅长体育运动。

synos.tran: 男性的；有男子气概的；刚健的

words.tran: 男子气；男子特点；生殖力
[生理] 男性化；[医] 男性化现象

trans.tranCn: 男性的；有男子气概的；刚健的
trans.tranOther: having or showing tradition­ally male qualities such as strength, courage etc – use this to show approval
